chinese: 椒聊之實、蕃衍盈升。彼其之子、碩大無朋。椒聊且、遠條且。
english: The clusters of the pepper plant,Large and luxuriant, would fill a pint.That hero thereIs large and peerless.O the pepper plant!How its shoots extend!

chinese: 椒聊之實、蕃衍盈匊。彼其之子、碩大且篤。椒聊且、遠條且。
english: The clusters of the pepper plant,Large and luxuriant, would fill both your hands.That hero thereIs large and generous.O the pepper plant!How its shoots extend!
